Name: 1st District
Description: A vibrant and cultural district known for its traditional architecture and proximity to Athens' southern landmarks.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A lively residential area, offering a mix of modern amenities and traditional Greek charm.

Name: 3rd District
Description: A quieter district with a suburban feel, offering green spaces and easy access to the city center.

Name: 4th District
Description: A bustling neighborhood with a mix of residential and commercial spaces, home to various cafes and shops.
